trans-unit.source: about_Script_Internationalization
trans-unit.target: about_Script_Internationalization

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Script Internationalization
trans-unit.target: 關於指令碼國際化

trans-unit.source: about_Script_Internationalization
trans-unit.target: about_Script_Internationalization

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: 主題

trans-unit.source: about_Script_Internationalization
trans-unit.target: about_Script_Internationalization

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Describes the script internationalization features of Windows PowerShell 2.0 that make it easy for scripts to display messages and instructions to users in their user interface (UI) language.
trans-unit.target: 描述讓指令碼，以顯示訊息，指示使用者在其使用者介面 (UI) 語言中的指令碼國際化功能的 Windows PowerShell 2.0。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell script internationalization features allow you to better serve users throughout the world by displaying Help and user messages for scripts and functions in the user's UI language.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 指令碼國際化功能可讓您滿足使用者遍佈全球使用者的 UI 語言顯示指令碼和函式的說明和使用者訊息。

trans-unit.source: The script internationalization features query the UI culture of the operating system during execution, import the appropriate translated text strings, and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼國際化功能查詢執行期間的 UI 文化特性的作業系統、 匯入的適當翻譯的文字字串，以及顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The Data section lets you store text strings separate from code so they are easily identified and extracted.
trans-unit.target: [資料] 區段可讓您儲存的文字字串的程式碼分開，以便輕易地識別及擷取。

trans-unit.source: A new cmdlet, ConvertFrom-StringData, converts text strings into dictionary-like hash tables to facilitate translation.
trans-unit.target: 將新的 cmdlet，Convertfrom-stringdata，會將文字字串轉換成類似字典的雜湊表，以利於進行轉譯。

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell 2.0 features used in script internationalization are not supported by Windows PowerShell 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 使用中指令碼國際化的 Windows PowerShell 2.0 功能不會受到 Windows PowerShell 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Scripts that include these features will not run in Windows PowerShell 1.0 without modification.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 1.0 不會執行包含這些功能的指令碼不需要修改。

trans-unit.source: To support international Help text, Windows PowerShell 2.0 includes the following features:
trans-unit.target: 若要支援國際說明文字，Windows PowerShell 2.0 會包含下列功能︰

trans-unit.source: -- A Data section that separates text strings from code instructions.
trans-unit.target: 從程式碼指示分隔文字字串--[資料] 區段中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Data section, see about_Data_Sections.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料區段的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Data_Sections。

trans-unit.source: -- New automatic variables, $PSCulture and $PSUICulture.
trans-unit.target: -新的自動變數、 $PSCulture 和 $PSUICulture。

trans-unit.source: $PSCulture stores the name of the UI language used on the system for elements such as the date, time, and currency.
trans-unit.target: $PSCulture 會儲存在系統上用於元素，例如日期、 時間和貨幣的 UI 語言的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The $PSUICulture variable stores the name of the UI language used on the system for user interface elements such as menus and text strings.
trans-unit.target: $PSUICulture 變數會儲存在系統上用於使用者介面項目，例如功能表和文字字串的 UI 語言的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -- A cmdlet, ConvertFrom-StringData, that converts text strings into dictionary-like hash tables to facilitate translation.
trans-unit.target: --Cmdlet，Convertfrom-stringdata，將文字字串轉換成類似字典的雜湊表，以利於進行轉譯。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see ConvertFrom-StringData.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Convertfrom-stringdata。

trans-unit.source: -- A new file type, .psd1, that stores translated text strings.
trans-unit.target: --新的檔案類型，.psd1 儲存轉譯的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The .psd1 files are stored in language-specific subdirectories of the script directory.
trans-unit.target: .Psd1 檔案會儲存在指令碼目錄之語言特定子目錄。

trans-unit.source: -- A cmdlet, Import-LocalizedData, that imports translated text strings for a specified language into a script at runtime.
trans-unit.target: --Cmdlet，Import-localizeddata，匯入到指令碼在執行階段轉譯指定語言的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet recognizes and imports strings in any Windows-supported language.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式會辨識並匯入任何 Windows 支援的語言中的字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information see Import-LocalizedData.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Import-localizeddata。

trans-unit.source: THE DATA SECTION: Storing Default Strings
trans-unit.target: [資料] 區段中︰ 儲存預設字串

trans-unit.source: Use a Data section in the script to store the text strings in the default language.
trans-unit.target: 使用指令碼中的資料區段來儲存文字字串中的預設語言。

trans-unit.source: Arrange the strings in key/value pairs in a here-string.
trans-unit.target: 排列在這裡字串中的索引鍵/值組中的字串。

trans-unit.source: Each key/value pair must be on a separate line.
trans-unit.target: 每個索引鍵/值組必須位於不同的行。

trans-unit.source: If you include comments, the comments must be on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: 如果您加入註解，註解必須在不同行。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom-StringData cmdlet converts the key/value pairs in the here-string into a dictionary-like hash table that is stored in the value of the Data section variable.
trans-unit.target: Convertfrom-stringdata cmdlet 會將此字串中的索引鍵/值組轉換成儲存在資料區段變數的值的字典式雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the Data section of the World.ps1 script includes the English-United States (en-US) set of prompt messages for a script.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，World.ps1 指令碼的資料區段包含指令碼的提示訊息美國 (EN-US) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom-StringData cmdlet converts the strings into a hash table and stores them in the $msgtable variable.
trans-unit.target: Convertfrom-stringdata cmdlet 將字串轉換成雜湊表，並將它們儲存在 $msgtable 變數中。

trans-unit.source: $msgTable = Data { culture="en-US" ConvertFrom-StringData @' helloWorld = Hello, World.
trans-unit.target: $msgTable = 資料 {文化特性 ="EN-US"Convertfrom-stringdata @' helloWorld = Hello，World。

trans-unit.source: errorMsg1 = You cannot leave the user name field blank.
trans-unit.target: errorMsg1 = 不能讓使用者名稱欄位空白。

trans-unit.source: promptMsg = Please enter your user name.
trans-unit.target: promptMsg = 請輸入您的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information about here-strings, see about_Quoting_Rules.
trans-unit.target: 如需 here-string 的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Quoting_Rules。

trans-unit.source: PSD1 FILES: Storing Translated Strings
trans-unit.target: PSD1 檔案︰ 儲存已翻譯字串

trans-unit.source: Save the script messages for each UI language in separate text files with the same name as the script and the .psd1 file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 將每個 UI 語言的指令碼訊息儲存在與指令碼和.psd1 副檔名同名的個別文字檔案。

trans-unit.source: Store the files in subdirectories of the script directory with names of cultures in the following format:
trans-unit.target: 將檔案儲存在指令碼目錄的子目錄，以下列格式的文化特性的名稱︰

trans-unit.source: Examples: de-DE, ar-SA, and zh-Hans
trans-unit.target: 範例︰ DE-DE、 AR-SA 和 zh hans Verbeeck

trans-unit.source: For example, if the World.ps1 script is stored in the C:\Scripts directory, you would create a file directory structure that resembles the following:
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果 World.ps1 指令碼儲存在 C:\Scripts 目錄中，您會建立檔案的目錄結構，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: C:\Scripts C:\Scripts\World.ps1 C:\Scripts\de-DE\World.psd1 C:\Scripts\ar-SA\World.psd1 C:\Scripts\zh-CN\World.psd1
trans-unit.target: C:\Scripts C:\Scripts\World.ps1 C:\Scripts\de-DE\World.psd1 C:\Scripts\ar-SA\World.psd1 C:\Scripts\zh-CN\World.psd1

trans-unit.source: The World.psd1 file in the de-DE subdirectory of the script directory might include the following statement:
trans-unit.target: 在 DE-DE 子目錄的指令碼目錄中的 World.psd1 檔可能包含下列陳述式︰

trans-unit.source: ConvertFrom-StringData @' helloWorld = Hello, World (in German).
trans-unit.target: Convertfrom-stringdata @' helloWorld = Hello，World （在德文）。

trans-unit.source: errorMsg1 = You cannot leave the user name field blank (in German).
trans-unit.target: errorMsg1 = 您不能讓使用者名稱欄位空白 （在德文）。

trans-unit.source: promptMsg = Please enter your user name (in German).
trans-unit.target: promptMsg = 請輸入您的使用者名稱 （在德文）。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the World.psd1 file in the ar-SA subdirectory of the script directory might includes the following statement:
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，指令碼目錄 AR-SA 子目錄中的 World.psd1 檔案可能包含下列陳述式︰

trans-unit.source: ConvertFrom-StringData @' helloWorld = Hello, World (in Arabic).
trans-unit.target: Convertfrom-stringdata @' helloWorld = Hello，World （以阿拉伯數字）。

trans-unit.source: errorMsg1 = You cannot leave the user name field blank (in Arabic).
trans-unit.target: errorMsg1 = 您不能讓使用者名稱欄位空白 （以阿拉伯數字）。

trans-unit.source: promptMsg = Please enter your user name (in Arabic).
trans-unit.target: promptMsg = 請輸入您的使用者名稱 （以阿拉伯數字）。

trans-unit.source: IMPORT-LOCALIZEDDATA: Dynamic Retrieval of Translated Strings
trans-unit.target: IMPORT-LOCALIZEDDATA︰ 已翻譯字串的動態擷取

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the strings in the UI language of the current user, use the Import-LocalizedData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前使用者的 UI 語言的字串，請使用 Import-localizeddata 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Import-LocalizedData finds the value of the $PSUICulture automatic variable and imports the content of the <script-name>.psd1 files in the subdirectory that matches the $PSUICulture value.
trans-unit.target: Import-localizeddata 尋找 $PSUICulture 自動變數和匯入的值符合 $PSUICulture 值的子目錄中檔案的 < 指令碼名稱 >.psd1 的內容。

trans-unit.source: Then, it saves the imported content in the variable specified by the value of the BindingVariable parameter.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會將匯入的內容儲存在 BindingVariable 參數的值所指定的變數。

trans-unit.source: import-localizeddata -bindingVariable msgTable
trans-unit.target: 匯入 import-localizeddata-bindingVariable msgTable

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Import-LocalizedData command appears in the C:\Scripts\World.ps1 script and the value of $PSUICulture is "ar-SA", Import-LocalizedData finds the following file:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Import-localizeddata 命令會出現在 C:\Scripts\World.ps1 指令碼，$PSUICulture 的值是"AR-SA"Import-localizeddata 會尋找下列檔案︰

trans-unit.source: C:\Scripts\ar-SA\World.psd1
trans-unit.target: C:\Scripts\ar-SA\World.psd1

trans-unit.source: Then, it imports the Arabic text strings from the file into the $msgTable variable, replacing any default strings that might be defined in the Data section of the World.ps1 script.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它阿拉伯文文字字串從檔案匯入到 $msgTable 變數，取代任何可能 World.ps1 指令碼的 [資料] 區段中定義的預設字串。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the script uses the $msgTable variable to display user messages, the messages are displayed in Arabic.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，當指令碼會使用 $msgTable 變數，以顯示使用者訊息，訊息會顯示以阿拉伯數字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following script displays the "Please enter your user name" message in Arabic:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列指令碼會顯示 「 請輸入您的使用者名稱 」 的訊息以阿拉伯數字︰

trans-unit.source: if (!($username)) { $msgTable.promptMsg }
trans-unit.target: 如果 (！ ($username)) {$msgTable.promptMsg}

trans-unit.source: If Import-LocalizedData cannot find a .psd1 file that matches the value of $PSUIculture, the value of $msgTable is not replaced, and the call to $msgTable.promptMsg displays the fallback en-US strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Import-localizeddata 找不到.psd1 檔案符合 $PSUIculture 的值、 $msgTable 值未被取代，並呼叫 $msgTable.promptMsg 顯示後援 EN-US 字串。

trans-unit.source: ExAMPLE
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This example shows how the script internationalization features are used in a script to display a day of the week to users in the language that is set on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示的指令碼國際化功能如何在指令碼中使用使用者電腦上設定的語言顯示星期幾。

trans-unit.source: The following is a complete listing of the Sample1.ps1 script file.
trans-unit.target: 以下是 Sample1.ps1 指令碼檔案的完整清單。

trans-unit.source: The script begins with a Data section named Day ($Day) that contains a ConvertFrom-StringData command.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼名為 Day ($Day) 包含 Convertfrom-stringdata 命令的資料區段的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The expression submitted to ConvertFrom-StringData is a here-string that contains the day names in the default UI culture, en-US, in key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 送出至 Convertfrom-stringdata 運算式是一個 here-string，其中包含預設 UI 文化特性，EN-US，索引鍵/值組中的日期名稱。

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom-StringData cmdlet converts the key/value pairs in the here-string into a hash table and then saves it in the value of the $Day variable.
trans-unit.target: Convertfrom-stringdata cmdlet 將這裡字串中的索引鍵/值組的雜湊資料表，然後將它儲存在 $Day 變數的值。

trans-unit.source: The Import-LocalizedData command imports the contents of the .psd1 file in the directory that matches the value of the $PSUICulture automatic variable and then saves it in the $Day variable, replacing the values of $Day that are defined in the Data section.
trans-unit.target: Import-localizeddata 命令匯入 $PSUICulture 自動變數的值相符，然後將它儲存在 $Day 變數中，取代在 [資料] 區段中定義的 $Day 值的目錄中的.psd1 檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: The remaining commands load the strings into an array and display them.
trans-unit.target: 剩餘的命令會將陣列載入的字串，並加以顯示。

trans-unit.source: $Day = DATA {
trans-unit.target: $Day = {資料
